item.title: By: Joseph Scott
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott
item.description:
In reply to <a href="/2015/07/02/sustainable/#comment-4359">julien51</a>.
I suspect many VCs are much more concerned with generating more money than with overall diversity ( at least the ones that talked up pattern matching for successful startups ).
item.content:encoded:
In reply to julien51.

I suspect many VCs are much more concerned with generating more money than with overall diversity ( at least the ones that talked up pattern matching for successful startups ).

item.title: By: julien51
item.dc:creator: julien51
item.description: Also, even more important than having big cos buying one another, we need diversity. Like any ecosystem, the resilience, the growth of the tech industry is directly related to its diversity of people, culture, techniques... etc.
item.content:encoded: Also, even more important than having big cos buying one another, we need diversity. Like any ecosystem, the resilience, the growth of the tech industry is directly related to its diversity of people, culture, techniques… etc.
